title: Is the duo bot theory true?
body: Is the theory about duo bots ALWAYS feeding true? Hasn't been proven wrong in my ~170 ranked games.

replies.body: You've probably been with lots of duo bots who just haven't mentioned it. However, the ones who make out they are entitled to bot lane are generally the ones you know about, and they generally yell at people who want a bot lane position. The duo bots who make a big deal out of being a duo-queued bot lane and get toxic are the ones who you generally know about, and toxic players ruin games.

Hope this is evidence enough ... Duo bot got me to plat last season (image below of final games) 

Sometimes even if we lose lane, the fact that my support and I communicate well and work together helps just as much in mid-to-end game when I need peels or help making picks 

Also I like having somebody on my team that I know is happy to support, rather than having a 5th pick get forced into it, perform badly then demotivate the team
What if there are two duo bot's in one game? Who feeds?
i wouldnt say always. problem is, most dont play enough norms to develop synergy before they dive into ranked

i do some of my best work as a duo in bot lane. rarely does any OTHER combo of duoing work out. especially if its 2 carry roles, one always gets starved out.

but jungle/mid and ADC/sup works best depending on who im playing with.

there were some duo pros who exclusively played ADC/sup, and the sup was the teams top and the ADC was either the jungler or the mid i forget. they did pretty well, beat the living %%%% out of fabby 4 games in a row, i remember that much... the 5th game fabby was on their team and he went jungle draven and went something like 3-12 basically looked like he was trying to troll them and make them lose after they gave him literally NO room to move in the last 2 games in bot lane.

really its not about DUO BOT feeding, its about FEEDING DUOS. if a duo feeds in bot lane, you can almost be certain they would feed in any other lane. and a feeding mid and top is much worse than a feeding bot lane, dying in lane harms those lanes much more than it does for a support to die heaps.
atleast in mid/late game an ADC even 0-5, as long as they still got some CS, can come back with good positioning if the top mid and jungle were still going ok, because then there is still a front line. but if top and mid or top and jungle are 0-5....every fight in mid game is going to be a wipe unless the ADC is some kind of GOD. and dont even THINK there is going to be a late game, if mid lane loses so hard they are 2 towers down at 12 minutes.
get the odd decent duo but generally duo bots are bad
